item.title: [REQ] An Auto Wood Cutter And Fletcher
item.dc:creator: @alche001 alche001
item.description:
@alche001 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:3, topic:140465”]I’ve made droppers before and let me tell you that you will get banned with those sorts of wait times, especially because they aren’t random. (Just thought i’d tell you that)

Also Why Do You Feel The Need To Capitalize Random Words In Your Sentence?[/quote] i dont know realy,

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] An Auto Wood Cutter And Fletcher
item.dc:creator: @alche001 alche001
item.description:
@alche001 wrote:

[IN CATHERBY west to bank <<<]
Can Anyone MAke ME An Wood Cutter Then When Inv is Full It fletches All To Willow longbows then when thats done it drops em all by this Dropper :

program autodropper;
// MADE by Alche001
begin

MoveMouseSmooth(650,185);
Wait(30);
ClickMouse(650,185,true);
Wait(30);
MoveMouseSmooth(625,231);
Wait(30);
